title: User Sets Up Parental Controls
description: A user wants to set up parental controls on their streaming account to restrict content for their children.

tasks.description: Guide the user to the parental control settings in their account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear instructions for navigating to the settings page.

tasks.description: Explain how to create a child's profile and set a content rating limit (e.g., PG).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the process of setting a rating restriction.

tasks.description: Verify from the backend that the new profile and its restrictions have been saved correctly.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent checks the system and confirms the parental controls are active.
